name: Remmington woodworks
description:
Warning! Some might find the content disturbing!

WASD - for movement. 

Space - for jumping.

Press Escape to quit the game.

Made in 7 days for the Spooktober 2021 game jam! Just a little experimenting and learning unity. Have fun! :D

Credits:

Map/house/grass/monster/programming by me.

Used these FREE assets:

Unity Asset Store:

Pickup Truck with Barrels - Beavy Store 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/free-pickup-truck-with-ba...

Free night sky - qianyuez

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-night-sky-7...

Cloudy Summer Day Skybox - Profi Developers

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/cloudy-summer-da...

Axe -Robert Ramsay's 3D assets store

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/axe-20493

Wood Products - Egor IIin

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/wood-products-80094
